com.github.bradylange.shapeproperties.shapes

Class Trapezoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bradylange.shapeproperties.shapes.Trapezoid

  • public class Trapezoid
extends java.lang.Object

    Contains trapezoid properties and algorithms to modify them.

    Trapezoid - a quadrilateral with only one pair of parallel sides.

    Since:
    1.0 (02/13/2017)
    Version:
    1.0.1 (01/09/2019)
    Author:
    Brady Lange - LinkedIn

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double area
      The measurement of the surface.
      private double baseOne
      The first side which is perpendicular to the altitude.
      private double baseTwo
      The second side which is perpendicular to the altitude.
      private double height
      The measurement from base to top.
      private double leftSide
      Left side.
      private double perimeter
      The measurement of the continuous line forming the boundary.
      private double rightSide
      Right side.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trapezoid()
      Constructs a Trapezoid object with the default properties.
      Trapezoid(double baseOne, double baseTwo, double height, double lSide, double rSide)
      Constructs a Trapezoid object with the properties baseOne, baseTwo, height, leftSide, and rightSide.

    • Field Detail

      • area

        private double area
        The measurement of the surface.

        Formula:

        • ((baseOne + baseTwo) / 2) * height

      • perimeter

        private double perimeter
        The measurement of the continuous line forming the boundary.

        Formula:

        • baseOne + baseTwo + leftSide + rightSide

      • baseOne

        private double baseOne
        The first side which is perpendicular to the altitude.

      • baseTwo

        private double baseTwo
        The second side which is perpendicular to the altitude.

      • height

        private double height
        The measurement from base to top.

      • leftSide

        private double leftSide
        Left side.

      • rightSide

        private double rightSide
        Right side.

        lSide - Measurement of the leftSide
